transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha sir bol raha hu
Executive: Good evening.
Customer: Sir main Roshan baat kar raha hu Indiamart se.
Haa
Executive: Hamari baat hui thi na subah mein.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: To sir aapne detail share nahi kara mujhe.
Customer: Abhi dal diya aapne hello karke dalo apne whatsapp pe.
Executive: Maine hello aapne hello dala tha na.
Customer: Ek minute dobara check kar leta hu main message aaya ki nahi aaya.
Executive: Ek ek second ek second.
Customer: Dekhiye maine hi kara hua hai na.
Executive: To sir paid customer agar hua to we will help you agar nahi hua to hum kya kar sakte hain that will let you know right baki aap mujhe thoda bahut services ka bata dijiye sir services kaise chal rahi hai hamari.
Customer: Thik hai abhi to thik chal rahi hai.
Executive: Service mein kahin kisi tarah ka koi issue.
Customer: Nahi abhi to nahi hai.
Executive: Indian market mein sir badhiya hai.
Customer: Ha thik hai.
Executive: Aapke calls percentage vagera bhi acche hai review rating ka aap dhyan dete ho sir.
Customer: Ha abhi to de beech beech mein pata nahi kahan se log dal dete hain ulta seedha kabhi kabhi.
Executive: Ha to please uska thoda tracking rakha kijiye kyunki wo one of the major part hai to get the lead.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Right aaj ke time pe har koi review rating dekhta hai abhi aapka 4.3 hai done by 148 users.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Right baki aapki category vagera sab updated hai kahin koi irrelevancy vagera se leke koi issue.
Customer: Nahi hai.
Executive: Aapka koi competitor vagera hai sir.
Customer: Local mein hai.
Executive: Kahan pe matlab yahi rewa mein hi.
Customer: Rewa mein jaise Ratan ji udyog ho gaya.
Executive: To rewa mein main agar search kar raha hu aapka agarbatti making machine.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To mere ko sabse pehle jo dikh rahe hain wo yahan ke dikh rahe hain Ahmedabad ki company hai Nilesh engineers karke.
Customer: Ha wo to star wale hai na.
Executive: Ha sir Rudra engineering ho gaya Vindhya industries ho gaya Akash unitech ho gaya Vrinda industries ho gaya.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To matlab sir hum star vagera kyun nahi plan karte Indiamart ke sath mein.
Customer: Kaisa.
Executive: Star vagera hum kyun nahi plan karte nahi transporting yahan pe itni jyada nahi hai apne aap se na.
Customer: Nahi matlab agar main by lead consumption ki hi main baat karu jo bhi aap abhi current aapka jo Indiamart ke sath mein aapka deal kar rahe ho right.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To abhi hamara jo major hum lagbhag sir nahi bhi to kam se kam 39 districts abhi by lead purchase kar rahe hain.
Executive: Jo aapka major market hai wo rewa hai prayagraj hai satna raipur bhuneshwar bangaloreu chhatarpur mirzapur chhatarpur mirzapur jaipur aur shahdol.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To yahan pe to aapki matlab hogi na acche transportation vagera.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: To hum local ke liye hamara matlab star services ya leading services mein hamare paas mein lagbhag do tarah ki service hoti hai usme ye hota hai ki ek keyword aapka top 10 city mein dikhega.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Right aur dusra keyword aapke top 10 cities mein dikhenge.
Executive: To wo top 10 city suppose ki aap 30 city ya 40 city se aap by lead purchase kar rahe ho.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Us 40 city mein sabse top 10 city at this present time.
Executive: Kaun sa hai kahan pe sabse jyada footfall aa raha hai kahan pe sabse jyada probability hai ki hum aapki visibility kare to aapke paas mein footfall jyada aaye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To in sab cities mein aapke to hai hi aur yahan pe in sab cities mein footfall bhi achcha khasa hai as you know ki already yahan pe dealing aapki chal rahi hai to footfall vagera bhi kafi achcha hai in sab cities mein.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To at least sir hum 10 city ke sath mein start kar sakte hain hum to pan India plan hi nahi kar rahe do teen state hamara main main cities cover ho jayegi.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Kyunki aap hamare sath mein pichle paanch saal se.
Customer: Ha koi nahi aap shayad jante bhi honge sara product ke bare mein kyunki pichle paanch che saal se aap hamare sath mein registered hai.
Customer: Ha hum sath mein kam kar rahe hain right.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To aap sara product jante bhi honge ki kaisa hai kya hai kya nahi hai kya benefit hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kyunki ab sir hamara sara AI development ke sath mein ho gaya hai ML ke sath mein ho gaya hai to probability of getting business considering the current situation in competition in this competitive market.
Executive: Ye apne aap ko company ko dikhana in different different cities ye bahut hi jyada necessary hai log dekh aapne sir kabhi apna product search kara hai aur aap apni company se gaye ho as a general buyer.
Customer: Kya sir.
Executive: Matlab jaise let suppose ki aap koi aapke paas call kaise karta hai ki aapka banda search karta hai aur kahin na kahin aapki company ke paas mein pahunchta hai company ke profile mein pahunchta hai wahan se wo inquiry ya call dalta hai right.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To aapne kabhi search kara hai sir ki kitne steps mein banda aapke paas mein aapki company se pahunch raha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Right abhi aapki company sirf aur sirf rewa mein bikti hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wahi rewa ke thoda sa bhi hum idhar udhar chale jate hain to hamari company ki visibility hi nahi aati hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Matlab aap jante ho sir aap prayagraj mein satna mein deal kar rahe ho koi search karta hai wahan pe agarbatti making machine vagera to wahan pe dikhti nahi hai hamari company.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur probability bahut achchi hai sir hamare paas mein business aapke product line mein bahut hi achcha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi to nahi hai plan jab hota hai to bata denge abhi to nahi hai.
Executive: Koi nahi sir isko aap please consider kijiye agar hota hai to.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai baki aapka na sir aapne niki ko call kara hua tha to aapka ek feedback open ho gaya tha.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Right to ye feedback main close kar raha hu aapke paas mein mera number bhi hai in future kabhi koi dikkat aaye to please aap mere se connect kijiiyega aapke profile mein kuch updation ki requirement hai total char product hai jisme photos nahi hai teen product hai jisme specification vagera updated nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To ek bari ko kabhi aap isme dona plate making machine mein bhi aap deal kar rahe ho kya.
Customer: Ha kar rahe hain.
Executive: To ye sab photos vagera bilkul updated nahi hai.
Customer: Iske liye aaj raat mein baith ke karunga main.
Executive: Ha isko kijiye kisi tarah ki koi dikkat ho to please aap hame bataiyega right aur sab mein ek ek keyword bhi hi updated hai aap keyword ko bhi thoda bifurcate kijiye.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To main ye abhi aapka feedback close kar raha hu aapke paas mein feedback chali jayega please aap feedback jarur share kijiiyega.
Customer: Thik hai na.
Executive: Thik hai koi kisi tarah ki dikkat hoti hai you can connect me anytime.
Customer: Thik hai unka detail main dalta hu aapko.
Executive: Ha sure sure sure sure sure.
Customer: Thank you sir.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has issues with review ratings.

- Wants to know about star services plan.

- Profile updation is required.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of review ratings.

- Explained about star services plan.

- Executive is closing the feedback form.

- Executive informed about profile updation.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update the profile.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- star services, profile updation, review ratings
